attributes.action: Stop the proposed Closure of the Community Science College @ Thornhill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Kirklees adminisration have proposed to close the Community Science College @ Thornhill and merge it with another school Castle Hall in a new super school.  No-one from either area is wanting this.  The people of Dewsbury South request that the closure be stopped.  

The school is an up and coming school with 12% rise in GCSE results last year one of the highest in Kirklees, its in teh top 50 in the country for improved attendance and the top school in Kirklees.

It has a fantastic teaching staff and head who believe all children can achieve and treat the young people as individuals not just numbers.
